subject: Good day
body:
Good day
investment/business opportunities with you. We represent high profiled
clients that are interested to explore investment / business
opportunities with you.Kindly permit us to discuss these
possibilities.
Warm regards,
Andrey Borovisky

subject: Re:   Good day
body:
Dear Andrey Borovisky,

Thank you for your email and the interest in exploring investment business with me. I am open to discussing potential opportunities. Could you please provide more details about the nature of the investments your clients are interested in? 

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Mark
